# syntax=docker/dockerfile:1.4

# Stage 1: Chef (dependency caching with cargo-chef)
FROM rust:1.78-alpine AS chef
RUN apk add --no-cache pkg-config openssl-dev && \
    cargo install cargo-chef
WORKDIR /app

# Stage 2: Planner (prepare cargo plan)
FROM chef AS planner
COPY Cargo.toml Cargo.lock ./
RUN cargo chef prepare --recipe-path recipe.json

# Stage 3: Rust Builder
FROM chef AS rust-builder
COPY --from=planner /app/recipe.json recipe.json
RUN cargo chef cook --release --recipe-path recipe.json
COPY server/ ./
RUN cargo build --release --manifest-path Cargo.toml
RUN strip target/release/inference-server

# Stage 4: Python Builder
FROM python:3.11-slim AS python-builder
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
    build-essential \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
RUN python -m venv /opt/venv
ENV PATH="/opt/venv/bin:$PATH"
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir --upgrade pip setuptools wheel && \
    pip install --no-cache-dir \
    torch==2.1.0 \
    transformers==4.34.0 \
    tokenizers==0.14.0 \
    safetensors==0.4.0

# Stage 5: Runtime
FROM debian:bookworm-slim
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
    ca-certificates \
    curl \
    libssl3 \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

RUN groupadd -r inference && useradd -r -g inference -u 1000 inference
WORKDIR /app

COPY --from=rust-builder /app/target/release/inference-server /usr/local/bin/
COPY --from=python-builder /opt/venv /opt/venv
ENV PATH="/opt/venv/bin:$PATH" \
    PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 \
    PYTHONDONTWRITEBYTECODE=1

RUN chown -R inference:inference /app && \
    chmod +x /usr/local/bin/inference-server

USER inference
EXPOSE 8080
LABEL org.opencontainers.image.title="Rust-Python ML Inference Server" \
      org.opencontainers.image.description="HuggingFace TGI-style inference server with Rust HTTP layer and Python ML models" \
      org.opencontainers.image.version="1.0" \
      org.opencontainers.image.authors="ML Team"

HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
    CMD curl -f http://localhost:8080/health || exit 1

ENTRYPOINT ["/usr/local/bin/inference-server"]
CMD ["--port", "8080"]
